pages.text: $(o)When holding a $(item)chunk of bone$()$(o), you should be able to break it apart in order to extract $(item)Essence$().$(p)I expect that the kinds of essence will seem very random, as there was once a wide variety of Animalia in the world.

pages.title: Essence
pages.text: It's likely that the essence of some creatures will be more common than others.$(p)You'll need a large amount of essence in general in order to restore Animalia, so even large quantities of the same essence should come in useful eventually.

I expect that many different kinds of fossils survived the $(thing)Extinction Event$(). These fossil types will likely be based on location. For example, the fossils in a frozen tundra may be different from the fossils in a forest.$(p)If this speculation is true, it will likely mean that the type of $(item)Essence$() you extract from a given bone chunk will be based on its type.
$(p)$(l:fossils_and_essence/ender_fossils)The next chapter will detail fossils from alien creatures.$()
